ESBMessagePipelineStorage.Name: Dynamic Topic Routing - Action
ESBMessagePipelineStorage.PipelineBlob:
<ESBMessagePipeline xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/"><Name>Dynamic Topic Routing - Action</Name><Properties xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" /><ReferencedAssemblies xmlns:d2p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" i:nil="true" /><Steps><ESBMessagePipelineStep i:type="ExceptionPipelineStepOfESBMessagexAPWb1W4"><Bindings xmlns:d4p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name i:nil="true" /><Catch><Bindings xmlns:d5p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name i:nil="true" /><Children><ESBMessagePipelineStep xmlns:d6p1="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/esb/" i:type="d6p1:EsbMessagePipelineExecutionPipelineStep"><Bindings xmlns:d7p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name>Process Exception</Name><d6p1:FileName i:nil="true" /><d6p1:PipelineName>Exception Handling</d6p1:PipelineName></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Children></Catch><Finally><Bindings xmlns:d5p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name i:nil="true" /><Children><ESBMessagePipelineStep i:type="CancelPipelineStepOfESBMessagexAPWb1W4"><Bindings xmlns:d7p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name>End Message</Name></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Children></Finally><Try><Bindings xmlns:d5p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name i:nil="true" /><Children><ESBMessagePipelineStep xmlns:d6p1="http://schemas.neuronesb.com/pipelines/esb/" i:type="d6p1:EsbMessagePublishPipelineStep"><Bindings xmlns:d7p1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Neuron.ComponentModel" /><Name>Contact Selector Pub</Name><d6p1:Semantic>Request</d6p1:Semantic><d6p1:TopicSelector i:type="d6p1:ESBMessageCodeTopicSelector"><d6p1:Code>//return topic
string soapAction = message.Header.Action;
if (System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(soapAction, "urn:demosvc.chris.net:echo:v1.*"))
{
	return "Echo.V1";
}
else if (System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(soapAction, "urn:demosvc.chris.net:echo:v2.*"))
{
	return "Echo.V2";
}
else {
	return "Echo.V0";
}</d6p1:Code><d6p1:ReferencedAssemblies xmlns:d8p1="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays"><d8p1:string>mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System.Xml, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System.Data, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System.Runtime.Serialization, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System.ServiceModel, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>Neuron.Esb, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=ed764b6eccb2f6cc</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>Neuron, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=ed764b6eccb2f6cc</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>Neuron.Pipelines, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=ed764b6eccb2f6cc</d8p1:string><d8p1:string>System.Core, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089</d8p1:string></d6p1:ReferencedAssemblies></d6p1:TopicSelector></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Children></Try></ESBMessagePipelineStep></Steps></ESBMessagePipeline>
